verificationTextRequirement: Please upload the required documents to verify your  store: business license, owner ID, address proof, and bank details. Your account will be activated upon successful verification.
heroText: A comprehensive app designed to simplify managing your store, products, and customer orders. We provide innovative and user-friendly tools to grow your business, enhance customer experience, and boost your success in the world of commerce.
heroTitle: Everything your store needs in one place with
exploreSubTitle: A simple and seamless user interface that allows you to easily purchase car spare parts.

about.title: Our Journey: A Story of Innovation and Excellence
about.missionText: Providing innovative technological solutions that help stores grow and achieve success easily and quickly.
about.vissionText: To become the first choice for e-commerce store owners in managing their businesses and achieving their commercial goals.
about.text: We are a team focused on developing innovative solutions for managing e-commerce stores. Our goal is to simplify store, product, and order management, helping business owners improve performance and boost sales. With our app, you get a seamless, integrated experience to manage your store professionally, from inventory tracking to order management. We believe success depends on efficiency, which is why our app is designed to support your business growth and save you time.

features.title: App Features
features.text: Provides you with innovative and easy-to-use tools to grow your business
features.f1Text: Track the status of each order from submission to delivery, with instant notifications for every update.
features.f2Text: Get accurate reports on sales, inventory, and orders to make data-driven decisions.
features.f3Text: We ensure the protection of your data and your customers' privacy using advanced security technologies.
features.f4Text: Our support team is always available to assist you and resolve any issues as quickly as possible.

downloadAppSub: Everything for your store in one place. Easier management, greater success with Amara Market.
